name: Tagatorni
description:
Tagatorni

Made in less than 72 hours for Ludum Dare 45 for which the theme was Start with nothing.

Credits
Team
- lilou_cormic | Programmer |  purplecable.ca | github.com/lilou-cormic
- Joshua McLean | Composer | mrjoshuamclean.com | https://soundcloud.com/joshuamclean17

Free assets and tools
- Contains music ©2019 Joshua McLean (mrjoshuamclean.com) Licensed under Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International
- Contains graphics by Kenney (kenney.nl) Licensed under Creative Commons CC0 1.0 Universal
- Made in Unity 2019.2.8f1, sounds with Bfxr

Controls

- Left mouse click on tower buttons to select tower type
- Left mouse click on empty base to build tower

Game 

- You start with practically nothing: $5 and 5 HP
- Build towers to defend yourself from the invader army
- Each enemy passing through reduces HP by 1
- Towers are cleared and HP is restored between each wave
- Money is kept between each wave

Planned

- Pause menu
- Enemy attack + tower destruction
- Upgrades (HP and towers)
- Different wave progression (different levels)
- Tutorial

Source code available on GitHub.
